replies.body: I was there once, except the only difference was from B1 50lp - B5 0lp. I'm now G5 44lp. The only tip that I can give from experience is to focus on improving just as much as you focus on winning. Good luck getting back to where you were man!

i can see i am going to bronze soon Played 4 till now lose all 4

S5 1LP RIP well i cannot help nor i can blame to those who went  1/8 2/12 its not their fault they r boosted and ruining every 1 games all the time 


i just cant do 1v9 anymore specially this season that's useless just cant carry bonobo i am hopeless now
Tell me your champion pool, might give me a feel of how you play.

> [{quoted}](name=PuncakesssR,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=kqeWfPXu,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-22T01:36:03.712+0000)

> Tell me your champion pool, might give me a feel of how you play.

mid syndra Taliyah karma 
jg shac j4  trundle eve

top irelia malph poppy (don't really play top a lot )

Try playing some more hard carry champions and trim down your champ pool a bit, This my not apply to you but I climbed pretty much playing only Gangplank and Yasuo, Yasuo for Bronze and Gangplank for silver. All I have to do is find a 3rd to get me through Gold xD. But yeah get more solo carry champs in your champ pool, take the time to learn them and you'll be seeing results. just remember climbing isnt something that happens overnight. Good luck man!

I don't play Yasuo, nor I play GP 

I don't like them so I guess I wont be playing them but thanks anyways
Well it doesnt have to be Yasuo or GP, try picking up champions that can carry without a team, I was using Yasuo and GP as examples.
Honestly think it is harder at the moment because of the rush to get end of season rewards. Yolo q is impossible right now. You need to duo,pre made, or get boosted.

> [{quoted}](name=Essembie,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=kqeWfPXu,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-09-21T20:23:53.460+0000)
>
> Honestly think it is harder at the moment because of the rush to get end of season rewards. Yolo q is impossible right now. You need to duo,pre made, or get boosted.

Why should it be harder because of the rush to get rewards? Do players leave their brains elsewhere and only think of winning and not focusing on the game? Just curious...

it's because people who are bad or new are now playing more and because people who are good are rushing smurfs and alternate accounts. This two current slipstream makes it harder to climb and artificially enhances the disparity between higher elo and lower elo, at least until the rush is over. It's hard to wrap your head around without having some knowledge of population statistics but think of it as taking a standard bell curve and slapping a huge whack on the upper and lower extremes of the population. Compared to simply just adding a bunch of the population evenly distributed, it would actually extend the extremes of each end to a much greater extent. In the end this means that it'll take more games to climb, especially once you hit that upper barrier around gold of smurf accounts rushing for high tier rewards.
I have noticed a lot more noobs in my games lately, not really smurfs though. Game skill is at an all time low right now.

look at the borderline between silver and gold; or spectate a few of your friends between gold and plat and trust me regular players are doing worse because of smurfs who just decimate even the high gold players.
This

Either smurfs boosting their mates over the line before cutoff, or previously unranked throwing their hats in the ring. The population composition has changed (and has done for the last few years) in the lead up to end of season.

I did that at the end of last season. Went from my G5 promos to S5 20 LP in a week. I kept playing thinking that "this will end the streak", but that never came. Even in my placements this season I went 2-8 and placed in B1.  

It sucked. I was so close to giving up ranked and blaming everyone but myself for what had happened. I took a step back from ranked and levelled up a new account and learned all I could about match-ups, synergies, creep manipulation, etc. When I started playing ranked again, I was playing in a 5man premade which was a really supportive environment. Eventually this tapered off to duo (which I found to be the best for me) which was still super great because I could have someone there to encourage me and keep me sane. The result was pretty apparent. I climbed from bronze to plat in a matter of months. I'm stuck in plat 2, but for me this is fine as I can redo my anti-tilt steps and hopefully get diamond next season :) 

Its a matter of stepping back and evaluating yourself and your skills (honestly). Take a lil break and learn what works for you and what doesn't. Then you can go back to climbing :D
yeah I guess this is what I am doing in this account, currently lvl 18 :/

I just came on to play a few games. First game today, felt like i was playing vs bronze 5 botlane. Turns out I was.... 

[See the game here.](https://imgur.com/a/SEe1Q)

When as a support i do more damage than their entire botlane combined, and you have Gold 4s in Bronze 5 games, you have to ask...

**What kind of fucked up matchmaking is that Riot?**

This is 9:30pm AUSEDT on a weekday where kids are still awake.
Dude this thread is a year old don’t necro
Don't worry, it can happen to anyone regardless of rank. Along with the highs, there are lows to the Ranked experience.
just sad, I was high silver so close to s1 :( wanted to b gold this season :( guess its so hard now

I know how you feel, as much as i didnt tilt to much in ranked i was 17/3 in norms and now im 7/13 in a matter of 24hrs and now im afraid of playing ranked haha. But all you can do it just keep going or quit haha.  But im now using this time to better myself , expand my champ pool , and practice mechanics and not look to much into my W/L ratio , i Like to win but you can only ever do so much.

I'm assuming you play on a different account, so I can't see your history. 
I'm also assuming you play lots of strong early game champions. 
At this Elo, games just do not end. They go forever. And you're playing Champs like sharp and driven who do nothing late game. 
There's your problem
